name: HANOI RURAL LIFE EXPERIENCE BY VESPA
description: Do you crave to leave the exciting and noisy city of Hanoi? Do you wish to look for a peaceful and slow life, see the difference with your native motherland? Let’s fulfill this desire with only 5 hours excursion on our vintage Vespas scooter. At Hanoi Vespa Adventures, we customize a unique itinerary that the normal tourists rarely find on any travel’s websites. But it's really value for your time to see the real slow life. By 5 hours riding on our vintage Vespas, you will pass the historical bridge, picturesque rice paddies, corn, sweet potato, herb, vegetable farms…Observe the daily life by visiting local families, interact with the caretakers, going to the field and try some farming activities like our farmers.  You will also make a visit to the spiral soil citadel (built 3rd BC) and the temple king of Au Lac. Short break on the bank of Duong river, you will have an outdoor footbath with local herb while enjoying some drinks. Returning to the city at noon time, stop at a restaurant for the lunch like our truly local with some famous street foods.
